channel.title: Banned?
channel.description:
Ok, well i've been searching in client.java for when someone is banned and goes to log in it says on their client your account has been disabled. But I can't find it. I searched for..
Code:
[code]out.write(0)[/code]
and couldn't find one regarding the ban message (4).
Also searched..
Code:
[code]if (returnCode == 21)[/code]
And couldn't find one regarding the ban message (4).
Can someone point me in the right direction.

item.title: Banned?
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

The return method is in client.java in the CLIENT. That return code there if(returnCode == 1) { etc, only tells the client which message to send to the client. So you need to edit the client for the ban message to change.

Read full topic

item.title: Banned?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

The server sends a packet back to the user, and the CLIENT, not the server, deals with that message.

Read full topic

item.title: Banned?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

I’m guessing you would just have to look for the area it rejects the connection and add that return code.

I’ve had no experience with this, at all, but if I took a good look at how it was all put out maybe I could do it.

Read full topic
